description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. On an asteroid mining quarry in deep space, two robots are fighting to gather precious ore. Each robot has the power to drop fake explosive ore to trick their opponent into losing their ore supply. Be the robot with the most ore when the timer runs out to claim victory!  Play against the computer in Trial Mode, or against your friend in the full version.

Play against the computer in Trial Mode, or against your friend in the full version.
